body: Oh, great, 6-part-series just ending in disappointment.
Damn I really need to get my ass on learning Japanese
It'd be nice to have some wholesome, monogamous and consensual futa on male more than once a year.
@Novapyro no, neither girls liked them, they got played hard

What I don't get is do the girls actually like them or not. From what I've seen so far, it looks like Kyokas not interested in dating because of her bride, but Kanade seemed bent on drawing out Juunya's pervy side. So what's going on?

I just want to point out, I called it. It was foreshadowed way back in chapter 1, shes crueler than the other girl. she was totally leading him and building him up to drop him, they both went for completely crushing them
Looks like it's the end of the story or something
There's a reason you shouldn't read the English translations. Piririnegi art = pretty good, Piririnegi story = trash that ruins the manga

What the hell kind of ending was that? "You really don't love me, you really just want your mother's love"

Then nothing gets solved on that front, his mother still completely dismisses him and praises his sister. The end? Could they seriously not spare a page or two where he at least yells at his mom that he doesn't want to be seen as useless to her? He just accepts it as the status quo and that's that? Really disappointed.
I can't understand this yet, but I Know she gave him the same answer Kyouka gave Yuto, or possibly worse.
